objects.query: SELECT Content__c, Language, Summary, Title, UrlName, IsVisibleInApp, IsVisibleInCsp, IsVisibleInPrm, IsVisibleInPkb FROM Knowledge__kav WHERE PublishStatus IN ('Online') AND IsLatestVersion = TRUE LIMIT 50
SELECT ParentId, DataCategoryGroupName, DataCategoryName FROM Knowledge__DataCategorySelection LIMIT 100
